title: MD
biography: Sanjay Pandey is an Indian actor mainly active in Bhojpuri films. He is famous for his negative roles in films. He has worked as main villain in several Bhojpuri films.
aiSummary: Sanjay Pandey is a movement disorders specialist with an H-index of 110 at Neurology (Faculty). Has been published in Social Science & Medicine. Based in India.
